name: GetLoyaltyProgram
description:
Retrieve the loyalty program details for a seller.

Use this tool to get information about the loyalty program in a seller's account. You can specify the program by its ID or use the keyword 'main' to access the primary program. This is useful for understanding how buyers earn points and redeem rewards in the loyalty program.

parameters.name: loyalty_program_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the loyalty program or the keyword 'main'. Use to retrieve the loyalty program of a seller.

value_schema.description: The ID of the loyalty program or the keyword `main`. Either value can be used to retrieve the single loyalty program that belongs to the seller.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.description: The ID of the loyalty program or the keyword `main`. Either value can be used to retrieve the single loyalty program that belongs to the seller.
